assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This ethics approval was granted from the provincial Health Research Ethics Board in St. John’s, NL, Canada. (Ref # 2018.221). All procedures followed were in accordance with the ethical standards of the responsible committee on human experimentation (institutional and national) and with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000. Informed consent was obtained from all patients for being included in the study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all respondents at the beginning of the online survey. Respondents could not begin the survey before reading the consent pages and ticking an appropriate check box. Consent was implied if respondents ticked the box and submitted a survey.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
